name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】SHARPLY Unsheathed. Here I Go! 3Dお披露目配信！これが古代兵器の本気。 #AnyaMelfissa3D [QVxgwstf-Aw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: MC section after the song performance, where Anya and Watame talk about the performance and their similarities.

subtitles.original: お気に召すまま
subtitles.english: At Your Pleasure

subtitles.original: なら　エンドロールまで
subtitles.english: So, until the end roll

subtitles.original: そぞろなしいな　この人生
subtitles.english: This life is a bit restless

subtitles.original: 退屈なんて言わないでね
subtitles.english: Don't say it's boring, okay?

subtitles.original: 言わないでね
subtitles.english: Don't say it, okay?

subtitles.original: 今更なんて言わないでね
subtitles.english: Don't say it's too late now, okay?

subtitles.original: 僕ら今　さあさあ輪になって
subtitles.english: We're now, come on, in a circle

subtitles.original: 回り始める　段々嫌になって
subtitles.english: Beginning to spin, gradually getting sick of it

subtitles.original: でも気になるね
subtitles.english: But I'm still curious, aren't I?

subtitles.original: 目は離せないや
subtitles.english: I can't take my eyes off it

subtitles.original: 自分勝手も　ドンドン宙に舞って
subtitles.english: Selfishness too, keeps dancing in the air

subtitles.original: でも離れてく　パッパ音に乗って
subtitles.english: But it drifts away, riding the sound

subtitles.original: 踊り始める　段々嫌になって
subtitles.english: Beginning to dance, gradually getting sick of it

subtitles.original: でも気になるね
subtitles.english: But I'm still curious, aren't I?

subtitles.original: 目は離せないや
subtitles.english: I can't take my eyes off it

subtitles.original: この先ずっと　僕の心をシェイクシェイクイェイ
subtitles.english: From now on, forever, shake shake my heart, yeah

subtitles.original: 大正解なんてないのさ　じゃあ一体どこに向かえば
subtitles.english: There's no right answer, so where should I head?

subtitles.original: 物語は終わりますか
subtitles.english: Will the story end?

subtitles.original: ワンツーの合図を待って　ユーアンドミー手が触れ合ったのは
subtitles.english: Waiting for the one-two signal, you and me, our hands touched

subtitles.original: 僕の勇気ある行動
subtitles.english: Because of my courageous action

subtitles.original: フェイズ
subtitles.english: Phase

subtitles.original: 畏まってたって　意味ないんだって
subtitles.english: Being stiff is meaningless

subtitles.original: 恥ずかしがってた　夢にバイバイです
subtitles.english: Goodbye to the dreams I was shy about

subtitles.original: この先ずっと　よろしくね
subtitles.english: From now on, forever, nice to meet you

subtitles.original: 君といま　さあさあ混ざり合って
subtitles.english: With you now, come on, mixing together

subtitles.original: 目を逸らしあう　段々嫌になって
subtitles.english: Avoiding each other's eyes, gradually getting sick of it

subtitles.original: でも気になるね
subtitles.english: But I'm still curious, aren't I?

subtitles.original: 目は離せないや
subtitles.english: I can't take my eyes off it

subtitles.original: 自分勝手も　トントン様になって
subtitles.english: Selfishness too, starts to look good

subtitles.original: 崩れ落ちてく　パッパ触れる前に
subtitles.english: Collapsing, before it can even touch

subtitles.original: 消えてしまうの　燦々嫌になって
subtitles.english: Disappearing, completely getting sick of it

subtitles.original: でも気になるね
subtitles.english: But I'm still curious, aren't I?

subtitles.original: 目は離せないや
subtitles.english: I can't take my eyes off it

subtitles.original: この先ずっと　分かり合えるまで僕たちは
subtitles.english: From now on, forever, until we understand each other, we...

subtitles.original: 今更なんて言わないでね
subtitles.english: Don't say it's too late now, okay?

subtitles.original: 僕ら今　さあさあ輪になって
subtitles.english: We're now, come on, in a circle

subtitles.original: 回り始める　段々嫌になって
subtitles.english: Beginning to spin, gradually getting sick of it

subtitles.original: でも気になるね
subtitles.english: But I'm still curious, aren't I?

subtitles.original: 目は離せないや
subtitles.english: I can't take my eyes off it

subtitles.original: 自分勝手も　ドンドン宙に舞って
subtitles.english: Selfishness too, keeps dancing in the air

subtitles.original: でも離れてく　パッパ音に乗って
subtitles.english: But it drifts away, riding the sound

subtitles.original: 踊り始める　段々嫌になって
subtitles.english: Beginning to dance, gradually getting sick of it

subtitles.original: でも気になるね
subtitles.english: But I'm still curious, aren't I?

subtitles.original: 目は離せないや
subtitles.english: I can't take my eyes off it

subtitles.original: この先ずっと　僕の心をシェイクシェイクイェイ
subtitles.english: From now on, forever, shake shake my heart, yeah

subtitles.original: わああ！　イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Waaaa! Yay!

subtitles.original: アーニャちゃん、3Dおめでとう！
subtitles.english: Anya-chan, congrats on your 3D!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 来てくれてありがとう、わためぇ！
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming, Watame!

subtitles.original: いえいえ、呼んでくれてありがと！
subtitles.english: No problem, thanks for inviting me!

subtitles.original: やったぜ！
subtitles.english: We did it!

subtitles.original: やった、もう最高に楽しかったですね。
subtitles.english: We did it, that was super fun.

subtitles.original: そうだね。ロックだったね。
subtitles.english: Right. It was rock.

subtitles.original: ね、ロック。めちゃくちゃ、もう、体がね、止まらないの。
subtitles.english: Yeah, rock. My body just... wouldn't stop.

subtitles.original: ああ、これ、これずっとやってるもん。
subtitles.english: Ah, I've been doing this the whole time.

subtitles.original: アーニャが……アーニャの手が止まらねぇ！
subtitles.english: Anya's... Anya's hand won't stop!

subtitles.original: やめろ！　あああ！
subtitles.english: Stop it! Aaaa!

subtitles.original: やめろ！　俺のパンチやめて！
subtitles.english: Stop it! Stop my punches!

subtitles.original: ということでね、なんでこの曲選んだの？
subtitles.english: So, why did you choose this song?

subtitles.original: え、だって、わためちゃんにかっこいい曲、似合うからね。
subtitles.english: Well, because cool songs suit you, Watame-chan.

subtitles.original: 嬉しい。え、大丈夫だった？　こんなやりたい放題させてもらって。
subtitles.english: I'm happy. Uh, was it okay? Letting me run wild like this.

subtitles.original: いやいやいや、これしかないやろ。
subtitles.english: No no no, it had to be this.

subtitles.original: これしかないよな、もう。
subtitles.english: It had to be this, really.

subtitles.original: これしかないよな。
subtitles.english: It had to be this.

subtitles.original: まあ、ロックしていこうぜ、この後も。
subtitles.english: Well, let's keep rocking after this too.

subtitles.original: ロックしていこうぜ！
subtitles.english: Let's keep rocking!

subtitles.original: ねー！　イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Right! Yay!

subtitles.original: もうね、あの、私達もね、気づいたんだけど……
subtitles.english: You know, we also noticed that...

subtitles.original: お、気づいたことがありました？
subtitles.english: Oh, you noticed something?

subtitles.original: なんと。顔が似てるんだよな！
subtitles.english: Actually, our faces look similar!

subtitles.original: お、似てる？　でかいということか？
subtitles.english: Oh, similar? You mean they're big?

subtitles.original: 似てるよね、ほら見て。
subtitles.english: They're similar, right? Look.

subtitles.original: ほらほら、似てるよね。
subtitles.english: Look, look, they're similar, right?

subtitles.original: いや似てるって。瞳の色もね、同じだし。紫だしね。
subtitles.english: I'm telling you, they're similar. Our eye color is the same too, both purple.

subtitles.original: ね、顔でかいし。
subtitles.english: And we have big faces.

subtitles.original: やっぱり顔でけー！
subtitles.english: Our faces are big after all!
